mapper.insert: insert into bbs(boardno, no, category, title, writedate, author, contents, region, star) values(#{boardno}, #{no}, #{category}, #{title}, sysdate, #{author}, #{contents}, #{region}, #{star})
mapper.select: select max(no) from bbs where boardno=#{boardno}
mapper.insert: insert into bbsfile(filename, boardno, no, fileoriginal) values(#{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boardno}, #{no}, #{fileoriginal})
mapper.delete: delete bbs where no = #{no} and boardno = #{boardno}
delete bbsfile where no = #{no} and boardno = #{boardno}
delete bbseval where no = #{no} and boardno = #{boardno}
delete bbscomment where no = #{no} and boardno = #{boardno}
mapper.select: select * from (select boardno, no, category, title, writedate, nickname, hits, good, bad, region, status, star, rownum r from (select * from bbs inner join member on bbs.author=member.userid where boardno = #{boardno} order by writedate desc)) where r between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select count(*) from bbs where boardno = #{boardno}

select boardno, no, category, title, writedate, nickname, contents, hits, good, bad, region, status, star from bbs inner join member on bbs.author=member.userid where no = #{no} and boardno = #{boardno}
mapper.update: update bbs set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, star = #{star}, region = #{region}, category = #{category} where no=#{no} and boardno=#{boardno}
update bbs set hits = hits+1 where no = #{no}
update bbsnotice set good = good+1 where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into bbscomment(commentno, contents, author, bad) values(#{commentno}, contents, #{author}, #{bad})
mapper.select: select * from (select boardno, no, commentno, contents, nickname, bad, rownum r from (select * from bbscomment inner join member on bbscomment.author=member.userid where boardno = #{boardno} and no = #{no} order by commentno asc)) where r between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select count(*) from bbscomment where boardno = #{boardno} and no = #{no}
